source.108bbfce:
import cudf
import pandas as pd
import datatable as dtable
import time
import gc

train_path = "../input/jane-street-market-prediction/train.csv"

start = time.time()
pandas_train = pd.read_csv(train_path)
pandas_time = time.time() - start

del pandas_train
gc.collect()

start = time.time()
rapids_train = cudf.read_csv(train_path)
rapids_time = time.time() - start

del rapids_train
gc.collect()

start = time.time()
dtable_train = dtable.fread(train_path).to_pandas()
dtable_time = time.time() - start

del dtable_train
gc.collect()

print(f"Pandas Reading Time :    {round(pandas_time, 1)} seconds")
print(f"Datatable Reading Time : {round(dtable_time, 1)} seconds")
print(f"Rapids Reading Time :    {round(rapids_time, 1)} seconds")
